Field Detail

TMPDIR

public static final java.io.File TMPDIR
The tmp directory This code used to be System.getenv("TMPDIR"). However, this was failing with Javasci to due architecture constraints Javasci (Java) => Call_scilab (C) => Scilab engine (C) => Java VM (graphics, xcos, etc). In this case, the Java VM is started by Javasci. Since, the TMPDIR env variable is set by Call_Scilab (the second step), the environnement in the Java world has not TMPDIR

SCI

public static final java.io.File SCI
The SCI directory (Scilab root directory)

SCIHOME

public static final java.io.File SCIHOME
The SCI configuration directory (Scilab home directory)

USERHOME

public static final java.lang.String USERHOME
The user home directory
